home.title: React Lazy Loading Demonstration
home.subtitle: How does Lazy Loading work?
home.description: Lazy loading allows components to be loaded only when they are needed, thus improving application performance.
home.explanation: In this application, all pages are loaded lazily. You can observe the loading by opening the developer tools (F12) and navigating between pages.

about.title: About Lazy Loading
about.subtitle: Why use Lazy Loading?
about.description: Lazy loading is an optimization technique that consists of delaying the loading of certain parts of your application until they are actually needed.
about.verification: This page itself is loaded lazily! You can verify in the Network tab of the developer tools that this page's code is only loaded when you navigate to it.
